page.title: 11CRAMOND :Gala Day
page.content: The Cramond and Davidsons Mains Gala is a popular yearly event held at D Mains Park which is just outside our D Block. We help to prepare and run the stalls and roundabouts and take part in the processions and ceremonies to crown the queen. This was not a year when the queen was chosen from our school but as usual we were pages and attendants. Our PTA ran the Gala Disco. Each year our runners try to win the relay race. It was a super day on 15 June. My friend and I went along and made a bee-line for the ice-cream tent. There was a massive queue for the candy-floss. While searching for my Mum we came across the ball in the net competition. This is where you have three shots at a goal-keeper and if you score all three you win a football. We didn't win!
